note: Writer. Traveler. Celebrating art in all its forms. Taking nothing for granted. South Jersey native, LA transplant, now wandering and wondering.

fields.name: Former profession
fields.value: 30+ years feature film, documentary, & short film producer. Founder, LA Shorts Fest.
